title: Easy access to shopping, freeways, and schools
neighborhood: 1108 Gary Carmena Ave, North Las Vegas, NV
posting_body: Rare single-story home with huge backyard!
Fresh interior paint, large living room, spacious kitchen with breakfast nook and stunning natural light throughout kitchen and main living area.
Dining room exits into the backyard covered patio.
Large, freshly-trimmed tree offers a beautiful curb appeal and makes an enjoyable view from the sitting area on the covered front patio.
Easy access to shopping, freeways, and schools
